realtime.title: Realtime
realtime.description: This example demonstrates using the pond.js library in conjunction with the charts library to do client side time series processing.

baselines.title: Baseline demo
baselines.description: This example demonstrates drawing multiple Baselines across a LineChart.

continents.title: Stacked AreaCharts
continents.description: This example demonstrates stacking of AreaCharts along with use of the Styler.

currency.title: Currency example
currency.description: This example demonstrates plotting multiple LineCharts on top of each other. The LineCharts are selectable and the time scale can be panned and zoomed.

cycling.title: Cycling example
cycling.description: A multi-channel visualization of a bike ride. Features pan and zoom and brushing.

ddos.title: DDoS attack
ddos.description: A LineChart example featuring scale transitions and an interactive legend

interfaces.title: Traffic breakdown
interfaces.description: Combining a Horizontal BarChart with an AreaChart to visualize relative contribution.

stockchart.title: Stockchart
stockchart.description: Example in progress to build a stock chart. Demonstrates log to linear scale transitions.

traffic.title: Network Traffic example
traffic.description: Example of how ESnet uses the charts library to display network traffic.

weather.title: Weather example
weather.description: Storm visualized as a multi-row chart.

volume.title: BarChart example
volume.description: Bar chart examples using traffic volume data.
